name: Chicken Dodge
description:
East Carolina University - Department of Computer Science
CSCI 4550 - Computer Game Development II - Spring 2021 

Title:  Chicken Dodge
Platform:  PC
Genre:  Arcade
Rating:  E
Target Market:  Ages 6+, casual gamers
Game Overview: 

Avoid all the chickens coming towards you at all cost. Beat your high score.
